<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158443</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158443</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3095</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ecological Research Project. Collecting abiotic data</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologisches Forschung Projekt. Sammeln von
von abiotic Daten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet de recherche Écologique. 
Rassemblement des données abiotiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto De Pesquisa Ecological. Coletando 
dados abiotic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto di ricerca Ecologico. Raccolta dei 
dati abiotic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικολογικό ερευνητικό πρόγραμμα. Συλλογή των 
αβιοτικών στοιχείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto De Investigación Ecológico. 
Recoger datos abiotic</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Thispage has instructions and explanations for collecting abiotic Data, which includes such aspects as strength of light , air and soil temperature , cumulative precipitation , wind velocity and more</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">research</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">abiotic factors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">data</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thispage hat Anweisungen und Erklärungen für das
Sammeln von von abiotic Daten, die solche Aspekte wie Stärke des 
Lichtes, der Luft- und Bodentemperatur, des kumulativen Niederschlags,
der Windgeschwindigkeit und mehr einschließt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thispage a des instructions et des explications 
pour rassembler les données abiotiques, qui incluent des aspects tels
que la force de la lumière, la température d'air et de sol, la 
précipitation cumulative, la vitesse de vent et plus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Thispage tem instruções e explanações para 
coletar os dados abiotic, que incluem aspectos como a força da luz, a
temperatura do ar e do solo, precipitação cumulativa, velocidade do 
vento e mais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Thispage ha istruzioni e spiegazioni per la 
raccolta dei dati abiotic, che includono tali funzioni come la 
resistenza di luce, temperatura del terreno e dell'aria, 
precipitazione cumulativa, velocità del vento e più</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Thispage έχει τις οδηγίες και τις εξηγήσεις για 
τη συλλογή του αβιοτικού στοιχείου, το οποίο περιλαμβάνει 
τέτοιες πτυχές όπως τη δύναμη του φωτός, της θερμοκρασίας αέρα 
και χώματος, της συσσωρευτικής πτώσης, της ταχύτητας αέρα και 
περισσότεροι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Thispage tiene instrucciones y las explicaciones 
para recoger los datos abiotic, que incluye los aspectos tales como la
fuerza de la luz, temperatura del aire y del suelo, precipitación 
acumulativa, velocidad del viento y más</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">abiotic Faktoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">recherche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">facteurs abiotiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">données</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesquisa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fatores abiotic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ricerca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fattori abiotic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dati</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">factores abiotic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
